name: Target: Unknown
description:
Target: Unknown is an arcade style 2D side scroller with a futuristic cyberpunk/western theme.

Target: Unknown takes place in the distant future. Traverse platforming set in brightly lit cyber cityscapes and dark, dangerous construction sites. The focus of the game is to hunt and kill as many targets as you can using your trusty revolver and grenades whilst doing your best to keep your character intact. Players will have to utilize their platforming skills to navigate and combat the bounty hunter’s targets.  

Thanks to Night Runner for providing the music for our game https://soundcloud.com/nightrunnermusic

System Requirements

  • Windows XP
  • Intel Core 2 Duo
  • 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX 9.0c Compatible Card
